description.zh: Docmost 是一个开源的协作式维基和文档管理平台，专为团队创建、共享和管理知识而设计。它支持实时编辑，并兼容多种内容类型，如图表、文件附件和嵌入内容。Docmost 提供自托管和云端两种部署方式，具备良好的扩展性和团队协作能力。
description.en: Docmost is an open-source collaborative wiki and documentation platform designed for teams to create, share, and manage knowledge. It enables real-time editing and supports a wide range of content types including diagrams, file attachments, and embeds. Available as both a self-hosted and cloud solution, Docmost is built with extensibility and team collaboration in mind.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 核心功能采用 AGPL 3.0 开源协议，支持自托管部署
- 面向团队的实时协作与知识共享设计
- 支持多语言翻译及企业级扩展能力

## 功能列表:

- 实时协作编辑
- 图表支持（Draw.io、Excalidraw、Mermaid）
- 空间管理
- 权限管理
- 用户组管理
- 页面评论
- 页面历史版本
- 全文搜索
- 文件附件上传
- 内容嵌入（支持 Airtable、Loom、Miro 等）
- 多语言翻译（支持10种以上语言）
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Open-source and self-hostable with AGPL 3.0 licensing for core features
- Designed for real-time team collaboration and knowledge sharing
- Supports multi-language translation and enterprise scalability

## Features:

- Real-time collaboration
- Diagrams (Draw.io, Excalidraw and Mermaid)
- Spaces
- Permissions management
- Groups
- Comments
- Page history
- Search
- File attachments
- Embeds (Airtable, Loom, Miro and more)
- Translations (10+ languages)
